Event.info: Comprehensive analysis of threat actors abusing Microsoft Teams capabilities for reconnaissance, initial access, persistence, and data exfiltration. Threat actors exploit Teams' core features including messaging, calls/meetings, and video-based screen sharing at different stages of the attack chain. Campaigns include phishing via Teams chat, malicious file uploads, external user impersonation, and guest account abuse. Microsoft Teams represents a high-value target due to its extensive collaboration features and global adoption.
